Message.Title: If DELL buys RIMM, it could easily enter mobile and get a strong foothold
Message.Msg: just like HPQ bought PALM...but Palm was a POS. RIMM has 79 million subcribers. Trading at 0.6 of book value. BB10 already getting rave reviews. DELL needs to move fast to compete with AAPL and GOOG on mobile.

Topic.Title: Bad machine, bad service, bad company
